description:
Mouse Jiggler is a very simple piece of software whose sole function is to "fake" mouse input to Windows, and jiggle the mouse pointer back and forth.

This prevents screen savers from activating, the computer from locking, or other inactivity-triggered events from occurring.
summary: Mouse Jiggler is a very simple piece of software whose sole function is to "fake" mouse input to Windows, and jiggle the mouse pointer back and forth.
author: Arkane Systems
